trends: There have been no other sightings in Route 27
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi went to meet my parents for dinner in clermont and am from kissimmee. last night my dad meet some neighbors on a hill to watch all the fireworks from the theme parks and all saw several orange fireballs in the sky almost above them around the same distance a jet would be. i've seen some ufo's before (zig zag across the sky and crazy bright lights) so i believed him and am mindful of it. before i left i looked things up on twitter and youtube and saw a small response to what he saw last night, with a few videos posted and posts on twitter about it. when i left it was dusk and saw a bright orange looking fireball to the east, to me it looked around the downtown area or past it, but it was low and the trees easily blocked it until i was up on a hill. as i continued to drive down 27 to reach 192 i saw it a few more times above the trees. i stopped once and got out google sky and checked, it was not a star, and no other stars were visible along the same level. i may have also saw another one to the south-west, but wasn't sure and couldn't look in two directions at once while driving. compared to the photos i saw on twitter\videos on youtube, it is a similar object in the sky.
Summary: Stationary Fireball in Sky two days in a row
